# juju_ssh_key (Resource)

Resource representing an SSH key.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "juju_ssh_key" "mykey" {
  model_uuid = juju_model.development.uuid
  payload    = "ssh-rsa  user@somewhere"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `model_uuid` (String) The UUID of the model to operate in.
- `payload` (String) SSH key payload.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Keys can be imported with the UUID of the model and the username of the key
$ terraform import juju_ssh_key.dev-user ssh_key:1d10a751-02c1-43d5-b46b-d84fe04d6fde:dev-user
```
